channel.title: [317][PI] Looking for a source and client
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I seem to be a dumbf*** when I say I need a 317 PI source and client since there are so many out there, but I need one with the newer graphics [no 474], not too much unnecessary stuff like customs, torva isn't needed either.
I mean a bit like InsidiaX but I heard people complaining about memleaks and such, and I wouldn't want to start on a base that isn't good.
If you think you know what I'm talking about please post one here, thanks alot, been looking for a good one for days now.
- Mthijs3

item.title: [317][PI] Looking for a source and client
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“mthijs3, post:5, topic:545891”][quote author=lare69 link=topic=664775.msg4444333#msg4444333 date=1408029275]

yeah practically every PI released isn’t good, but your best bet is to start with the original one that doesn’t have much content. usually the more content a PI server has the more butchered it is

Thanks alot for your advice, but could you please link me to an example?

… an example of what?
[/quote]

The original one that doesn’t have much content, since all I find is servers with a lot of stuff I don’t need :[/quote]
http://lmgtfy.com/?q=project+insanity+original

Read full topic
